summary: During the 20-day leave, war correspondent Lopatin travels by train to the distant city of Tashkent. It's very far from the front but the war seems to be present in people's minds even there.
cast: Yuriy Nikulin|Lyudmila Gurchenko|Aleksey Petrenko|Angelina Stepanova|Yekaterina Vasilyeva|Nikolay Grinko|Lyusena Ovchinnikova|Mikhail Kononov|Liya Akhedzhakova|Rashid Sadykov|Konstantin Simonov|Nikolay Mikheev|Vladimir Mishanin
keywords: war correspondent|aerial bombardment|aerial attack|red army|soviet soldier
title: Dvadtsat dney bez voyny
